snippet: The morning television shake-up that NBC News said would not come -- even as recently as two weeks ago -- arrived on Monday when ABC's "Good Morning America," based on preliminary weekly ratings, defeated NBC's "Today" show for the first time in 852...
abstract: The morning television shake-up that NBC News said would not come -- even as recently as two weeks ago -- arrived on Monday when ABC's "Good Morning America," based on preliminary weekly ratings, defeated NBC's "Today" show for the first time in 852 weeks.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER and BILL CARTER

headline.main: 'GMA' Appears to Nudge 'Today' From Top Spot After 16 Years
headline.print_headline: ‘Today’ Show Streak at Top Is Halted by ‘GMA’
